    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:D218_5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>D218_5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Children’s rights</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Children?s Rechte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Droites de Children?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Direitas de Children?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diritti di Children?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δικαιώματα Children?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las derechas de Children?s</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">How do children fit in to our society? This unit will help you to understand the issues surrounding children's rights as well as examining the implications of seeing children as citizens. You will also explore the meaning of childhood and analyse children's needs.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Society</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Audio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Childrens_rights</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Citizen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Citizenship</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie passen Kinder innen zu unserer Gesellschaft? 
Diese Maßeinheit hilft Ihnen, die Ausgaben zu verstehen, die 
Rechte der Kinder sowie das Überprüfen der Implikationen des Sehens 
der Kinder als Bürger umgeben. Sie auch erforschen die 
Bedeutung der Kindheit und analysieren Notwendigkeiten der Kinder.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment les enfants s'adaptent-ils dedans à notre
société ? Cette unité vous aidera à comprendre les issues 
entourant les juste des enfants aussi bien qu'examiner les 
implications de voir des enfants comme citoyens. Vous également
explorerez la signification de l'enfance et analyserez les besoins des
enfants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como as crianças cabem dentro a nossa sociedade? 
Esta unidade ajudar-lhe-á compreender as edições que cercam 
direitas das crianças as.well.as examinar as implicações de ver 
crianças como cidadãos. Você também explorará o meaning da 
infância e analisará necessidades das crianças.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come i bambini si adattare dentro alla nostra 
società? Questa unità li aiuterà a capire le edizioni che 
circondano i diritti dei bambini così come esaminare le implicazioni 
di vedere i bambini come cittadini. Egualmente esplorerete il 
significato dell'infanzia ed analizzerete i bisogni dei bambini.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς τα παιδιά ταιριάζουν στην κοινωνία μας; 
Αυτή η μονάδα θα σας βοηθήσει για να καταλάβει τα ζητήματα 
που περιβάλλουν τα δικαιώματα των παιδιών καθώς επίσης και που 
εξετάζουν τις επιπτώσεις να δει τα παιδιά ως πολίτες. 
Θα ερευνήσετε επίσης την έννοια της παιδικής ηλικίας και θα
αναλύσετε τις ανάγκες των παιδιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo los niños caben adentro a nuestra 
sociedad? Esta unidad le ayudará a entender las ediciones que 
rodean las derechas de los niños así como examinar las implicaciones
de considerar a niños como ciudadanos. Usted también 
explorará el significado de la niñez y analizará las necesidades de
los niños.</string>
          </description>
